verbose_text: The effect of culture conditions on testicular fragments was weekly assessed by histological evaluation of germ cell development and immunohistochemical identification of spermatogonia (using MAGEA4), proliferative status of spermatogonia and Sertoli cells (using proliferating cell nuclear antigen [PCNA]), intratubular cell apoptosis (by terminal deoxynucleotidyl transferase mediated dUTP nick-end labelling) and Sertoli cells maturation (using Anti-Mullerian Hormone [AMH] versus Androgen Receptor [AR]).
